content: Thanks for understanding the drama of my homeland, which is, like Pablo Neruda would say, a silent Vietnam; there are no occupying troops, nor powerful planes clouding the clean skies of my land, but we're under financial blockade, we have no credit, we can't buy spare parts, we have no means to buy food and we need medicine...
translations: ita:Grazie per aver compreso il dramma della mia patria, che è, come direbbe Pablo Neruda, un Vietnam silenzioso; non c'è un
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by marcelostockle (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
